events.description: Silver prices dropped significantly, falling as much as 16.5% to approximately $73.5 per ounce.
Release of labor data showing 108.4K job cuts and initial claims rising to 231K.
The nomination of Kevin Warsh as Fed chair, introducing policy uncertainty regarding balance sheet size and easing pace.
Confirmation of upcoming talks between the US and Iran, reducing geopolitical tension.

facts.fact_text: Silver prices fell by 16.5% to around $73.5 per ounce.

evidences.evidence_text: Silver slumped as much as 16.5% to around $73.5 per ounce

facts.fact_text: There were 108.4K job cuts in January.

evidences.evidence_text: a jump in initial claims to 231K

facts.fact_text: Upcoming talks between the US and Iran have been confirmed.

evidences.evidence_text: confirmation of upcoming US Iran talks

claims.claim_text: Deteriorating labor signals have increased the likelihood of Federal Reserve rate cuts in 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: deteriorating US labour signals... reinforced expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts later this year

claims.claim_text: Market participants prioritized reducing risk over seeking safe-haven assets during the silver price drop.

evidences.evidence_text: the immediate response favoured risk reduction rather than defensive inflows

claims.claim_text: Kevin Warsh is perceived as favoring a smaller balance sheet and a cautious approach to monetary easing.
claims.author: Market participants

evidences.evidence_text: given his preference for a smaller balance sheet and a more cautious approach to easing

claims.claim_text: The confirmation of US-Iran talks has lowered the demand for safe-haven investments.

evidences.evidence_text: easing geopolitical risk after confirmation of upcoming US Iran talks reduced near term safe haven demand

evidence.evidence_text: deteriorating US labour signals... reinforced expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts
Policy uncertainty also lingered as markets weighed Kevin Warsh’s nomination
easing geopolitical risk after confirmation of upcoming US Iran talks reduced near term safe haven demand
pressuring silver through margin driven selling after last week’s sharp rally
